Method disableCdn (line 38)

ObjectStorage_Container disableCdn( )

Disables CDN. This method removes a "public read" meta data.

You have to call ObjectStorage_Abstract::create or ObjectStorage_Abstract_update method in order for this to take affect.

Info

  • access - public

Method enableCdn (line 25)

ObjectStorage_Container enableCdn( )

Enables CDN. This method sets a "public read" meta data.

You have to call ObjectStorage_Abstract::create or ObjectStorage_Abstract_update method in order for this to take affect.

Info

  • access - public

Inherited Method Summary

Inherited From Class ObjectStorage_Abstract

ObjectStorage_Abstract::__construct() - Constructor.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::create() - Creates a container or an object on ObjectStorage

ObjectStorage_Abstract::delete() - Deletes a container or an object on ObjectStorage

ObjectStorage_Abstract::get() - Retrieves the container or object data from ObjectStorage $limit and $marker will not be taken into consideration when dealing with an object.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getBody() - Gets body data from response object

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getCdnUrls() - Returns all CDN URLs

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getContainerCount() - Returns total number of containers

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getContext() - Returns the ObjectStorage context value

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getHeader() - Gets a response header by key

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getHeaders() - Gets an array of response headers

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getInfo() - Returns the header and meta data of a container or an object.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getMeta() - Gets a meta data by key in the response

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getObjectCount() - Returns total number of objects within the current container

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getPath() - Returns the ObjectStorage path

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getRequest() - Return ObjectStorage_Http_Request object

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getResponse() - Returns ObjectStorage_Http_Response object

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getStatusCode() - Returns response HTTP status code

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getTtl() - Gets a TTL value for a container or an object from HTTP response

ObjectStorage_Abstract::getUrl() - Returns the full ObjectStorage URL

ObjectStorage_Abstract::reload() - Reloads the current object with the newly retrieved data from ObjectStorage.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::removeContext() - Removes the ObjectStorage context if any. It reset the context back to the default ObjectStorage context.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setAccountMeta() - Sets a meta data

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setBody() - Sets request body

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setContext() - Sets the ObjectStorage context. Valid context values are: cdn, search

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setFilter() - Sets a search filter. This method is used when you are working in "search" context.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setHeader() - Sets a request header Use this when you need to add special request headers such as X-CDN-CNAME and so on.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setHeaders() - Sets an array of ObjectStorage headers

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setMeta() - Sets a meta data "Meta data" is an optional custom header and it is a part of the ObjectStorage response headers

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setMetaList() - Sets an array of meta data

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setMime() - Sets a ObjectStorage response format. Available values are: json, xml, text

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setParam() - Sets a query parameter. This method is used to set a URL parameter.

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setResponse() - Sets response object

ObjectStorage_Abstract::setTtl() - Sets a TTL value for a container or an object

ObjectStorage_Abstract::update() - Updates a container or an object on ObjectStorage
